snp1.8:1.1_0: “This is what should be done by those who are skilled in goodness,
snp1.8:1.2_0: and have known the place of peace.
snp1.8:1.3_0: Let them be able and upright, very upright,
snp1.8:1.4_0: easy to speak to, gentle and humble;
snp1.8:10.4_0: they never come back to a womb again.”
snp1.8:3.1_0: Let them not do the slightest thing
snp1.8:3.2_0: that others might blame with reason.
snp1.8:3.3_0: May they be happy and safe!
snp1.8:3.4_0: because of all states of existence.
snp1.8:4.2_0: with not a one left out—
snp1.8:4.3_0: frail or firm, long or large,
snp1.8:5.3_0: those born or to be born:
snp1.8:5.4_0: because of all states of existence.
snp1.8:6.2_0: nor look down on anyone anywhere.
snp1.8:6.4_0: let them not wish pain on each other.
snp1.8:7.1_0: Even as a mother would protect with her life
snp1.8:8.1_0: With love for the whole world,
snp1.8:9.2_0: or lying down while yet unweary,
snp1.8:9.4_0: for this, they say, is a holy abiding in this life.
